entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
